item.title: Spanish Conversation at CLP Lawrenceville
item.description:
Today we met at the Carnegie Library of Pittsburgh - Lawrenceville.

The song that was used for the exercise today was

The documents we shared today with people who attended the Meetup group were

  • TinyCards Music List for Spring 2020
  • Morat - Yo no merezco volver

See you all in a couple of weeks!

item.title: ¡Felices Fiestas!
item.description:
The Pittsburgh Spanish Meetup is on hiatus until 2020. Please, enjoy time with family and friends.

I am actually thinking about starting a Spanish club at Carnegie Mellon, do you think people would be interested? I really hope so.

item.title: Let's practice some Spanish at Cilantro y Ajo!
item.description:
THIS EVENT IS FOR BEGINNERS-INTERMEDIATE SPANISH SPEAKERS

Hi! As some of you know, I am leading Spanish II in Carnegie Library of Pittsburgh. With some of the current members of the group, we will go to Cilantro y Ajo and order some good food.

The catch? You need to order in Spanish! Speaking Spanish is not mandatory for eating but it is for ordering.

Are you up for the challenge?

You can find the menu here

P.S. See you this Saturday!
